ingredients.name: Beef
ingredients.description: A rich, savory red meat with a firm texture, commonly used in steaks, roasts, and ground beef dishes. It is a staple in global cuisines, from American burgers to Japanese Wagyu.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: High in protein, iron, and B vitamins, particularly B12, which is essential for red blood cell production. Also contains zinc and creatine, supporting muscle growth and energy metabolism.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in a variety of dishes, including grilling, roasting, stewing, and braising. Popular in dishes such as steaks, burgers, tacos, and stir-fries.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store raw beef in the refrigerator at or below 40°F (4°C) for up to 5 days. Freeze for up to 6-12 months at 0°F (-18°C). Thaw in the fridge overnight before cooking.

ingredients.description: Mildly nutty seeds with a crunchy texture, commonly eaten raw, roasted, or used in salads and snacks.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: High in vitamin E, selenium, and healthy fats, supporting skin health and immune function.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in trail mixes, salads, granola, and as sunflower seed butter.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dark place for up to 1 year.

ingredients.name: Pumpkin seeds
ingredients.description: Flat, oval seeds with a crunchy texture and nutty taste, often roasted and eaten as a snack or added to dishes.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Rich in magnesium, zinc, and healthy fats, supporting heart health and immune function.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in granola, soups, salads, and as a topping for baked goods.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place for up to 1 year.

ingredients.name: Hemp seeds
ingredients.description: Small, soft seeds with a mild, nutty flavor, rich in protein and omega-3 fatty acids, commonly added to smoothies and cereals.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Complete protein source with essential amino acids, omega-3 and omega-6 fats, supporting muscle growth and brain health.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in smoothies, salads, oatmeal, yogurt, and hemp milk production.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 1 year to prevent rancidity.

ingredients.name: Sesame seeds
ingredients.description: Tiny, oil-rich seeds with a nutty flavor, commonly used in Asian, Middle Eastern, and baked goods.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Rich in healthy fats, calcium, magnesium, and antioxidants, promoting bone and heart health.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in tahini, baked goods, salads, sushi, and as a topping for stir-fries.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in a cool, dry place for up to 2 years; refrigerate for longer freshness.

ingredients.name: Poppy seeds
ingredients.description: Tiny, round seeds with a mild, nutty flavor, often used in baking and salad dressings.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Good source of calcium, magnesium, and dietary fiber, supporting bone health and digestion.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in baked goods, salad dressings, and as a topping for bread and bagels.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place for up to 2 years.

ingredients.name: Baking powder
ingredients.description: A dry chemical leavening agent made from a combination of baking soda, an acid, and a moisture absorber, used to give baked goods a light texture.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Provides no significant nutrients but aids in achieving proper texture in baked goods.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in cakes, cookies, and quick breads to create a light, airy structure.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place for up to 2 years.

ingredients.name: Baking soda
ingredients.description: A fine white powder composed of sodium bicarbonate, used as a leavening agent when combined with acids like vinegar or lemon juice.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Contains sodium, aiding in pH balance and digestion when used appropriately.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in baking, as a tenderizer in cooking, and for neutralizing acidity.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in a sealed container in a cool, dry place for up to 4 years.

ingredients.name: Yeast
ingredients.description: A living microorganism that ferments sugars to produce carbon dioxide, causing dough to rise, available in dry, fresh, and instant forms.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Provides B vitamins, protein, and probiotics, beneficial for digestion and metabolism.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in bread, pizza dough, and fermented baked goods to provide rise and flavor.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store dry yeast in a sealed container in a cool, dry place for up to 6 months; refrigerate or freeze for extended shelf life.

ingredients.name: Cornstarch
ingredients.description: A fine, powdery starch extracted from corn, used as a thickening agent in sauces, soups, and baked goods.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Primarily provides carbohydrates for energy but lacks significant nutrients.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Thickens puddings, sauces, and soups; used in baking for texture modification.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place for up to 2 years.

ingredients.name: Cocoa powder
ingredients.description: A dry, bitter powder made from roasted and ground cacao beans, used for flavoring chocolate-based desserts and beverages.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Rich in antioxidants, iron, and magnesium, supporting heart health and brain function.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in cakes, brownies, hot chocolate, and confections.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place for up to 2 years.

ingredients.name: Chocolate chips
ingredients.description: Small, sweetened morsels of chocolate that retain their shape when baked, available in various flavors and cocoa content.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Contains flavonoids and antioxidants, supporting cardiovascular health.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in cookies, muffins, brownies, and melted for drizzling or coating desserts.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place for up to 1 year; refrigerate for prolonged freshness.

ingredients.name: Vanilla extract
ingredients.description: A liquid flavoring made by macerating vanilla beans in alcohol, widely used in baking and desserts.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Contains trace antioxidants but is primarily used for flavoring.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Enhances flavor in cakes, cookies, custards, and beverages.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in a dark, cool place for up to 5 years; does not require refrigeration.

ingredients.name: Almond extract
ingredients.description: A concentrated liquid flavoring derived from almonds or apricot kernels, used to add a nutty aroma to baked goods.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Provides no significant nutrients but enhances flavor.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in cookies, cakes, and pastries to add a distinct almond essence.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in a cool, dark place for up to 5 years.

ingredients.name: Gelatin
ingredients.description: A translucent, flavorless protein derived from collagen, used as a gelling agent in desserts, candies, and savory dishes.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Rich in collagen, supporting joint, skin, and gut health.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in jellies, marshmallows, mousses, and as a thickener in broths.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in an airtight container in a cool, dry place for up to 2 years.

ingredients.name: Chicken broth
ingredients.description: A flavorful liquid made by simmering chicken meat, bones, and vegetables, commonly used as a base for soups, sauces, and stews.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Contains protein, collagen, and electrolytes, supporting hydration and gut health.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in soups, risottos, sauces, and braising to enhance flavor and depth.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store refrigerated for up to 5 days or freeze for up to 6 months.

ingredients.name: Beef broth
ingredients.description: A rich, savory liquid made by simmering beef bones, meat, and vegetables, often used as a base for stews, gravies, and soups.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Provides protein, iron, and essential amino acids, supporting muscle health and digestion.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in braised dishes, gravies, soups, and sauces for deep, umami-rich flavor.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days or freeze for up to 6 months.

ingredients.name: Vegetable broth
ingredients.description: A light, aromatic liquid made by simmering vegetables, herbs, and spices, often used as a base for vegetarian and vegan dishes.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Low in calories, rich in antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals from vegetables.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in soups, stews, grains, and sauces to add depth and nutrition.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Refrigerate for up to 5 days or freeze for up to 6 months.

ingredients.name: Fish stock
ingredients.description: A light, flavorful liquid made by simmering fish bones, herbs, and aromatics, commonly used in seafood-based soups and sauces.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: Provides protein, omega-3 fatty acids, and essential minerals, supporting brain and heart health.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Used in bouillabaisse, chowders, seafood sauces, and risottos for a rich seafood essence.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Refrigerate for up to 3 days or freeze for up to 3 months.

ingredients.name: Bone broth
ingredients.description: A nutrient-dense broth made by simmering animal bones and connective tissues for an extended period, known for its high collagen content.

details.title: Nutritional Benefits
details.description: High in collagen, gelatin, and amino acids, supporting joint, skin, and gut health.

details.title: Culinary Uses
details.description: Consumed as a warm beverage or used as a base in soups, stews, and braised dishes.

details.title: Storage and Shelf Life
details.description: Refrigerate for up to 7 days or freeze for up to 6 months.
